meanings.definition: A photograph that one has taken of oneself, typically with a smartphone or webcam, and shared via social media.
meanings.sent1: She loves to take selfies with her friends during parties.
meanings.sent2: He posted several selfies on his Instagram account.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to take selfies with its paw on the phone.
meanings.sent4: His room was filled with selfies, capturing different moments.
meanings.sent5: The wall was covered with colorful selfies, each telling a story.

meanings.definition: The act of taking a photograph of oneself.
meanings.sent1: Taking selfies has become a popular trend among teenagers.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her selfies in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent3: The dog attempted to learn how to take selfies.
meanings.sent4: His selfies always showed a big smile on his face.
meanings.sent5: The museum had a section dedicated to historical selfies.
